item.title: Mondavi celebrates 50 years with free public event
item.description:
Mondavi celebrates 50 years with free public event

The Robert Mondavi Winery in Oakville celebrates its 50th anniversary on July 16. The event begins at noon and will include live music, wine seminars and tastings, cooking demonstrations with top local chefs, a photo booth and horse-and-buggy rides through the historic To Kalon Vineyard.

item.description:
